description:
Chopper and Sanji look back on Zoro’s battle against King the Wildfire, a Lead Performer of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. They explain how Zoro struggles to find a way to defeat the seemingly invincible King.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Analyse d`un combat intense. Zoro contre la Superstar !
Dai Gekisen Tokushuu! Zoro vs Ookanban!
Recapping Fierce Fights! Zoro vs. a Lead Performer!
Rückblick auf einen stürmischen Kampf! – Zorro gegen einen All-Star!
大激戦特集! ゾロVS大看板!
